title: Da best

title: Missing features
text:
Missing feature: auto-advance.
It automatically advances to the previous (older) message and there is no option to customize this like on the other platforms ( Android, Windows ).

title: label:unread and google contacts labels
text: Fix the issues with reading unread emails (closing what you read) which in level:unread filter. Google contacts labels are not supported in the either IOS or IPadOS but works wonderfully in the browser.

title: Service
text: The best email service there is

title: Freezes
text: Please update this app to cooperate with the latest apple update. When clicking to open emails, they freeze after 1-3 and cannot open another email without closing the app. Thanks.

title: Great app but…
text: This app is the best app to get obviously but one stupid thing is when I transferred my stuff on a new phone I tried to get in gmail,I put in my account and everything else but for some reason it said “to verify open the gmail app and click yes to verify” that is so dumb

title: Refusing to return to main menu
text: A few days ago my Gmail app started locking up. I’d open an email and when I attempted to return to the email main page it would lock in  to the opened email. I’d have to restart the iPad to get it to work and then it would do it all over again. I’ve deleted the app and reinstalled it hoping for the best.

title: Integrated menu disappears if Chat or Meet apps are disabled
text:
If Chat/Meet icons are turned off (to get extra lines at bottom),switching BACK to Gmail for other app restores latest email screen, but NO GMAIL MENU (and back button does nothing). 
Must swipe/close Gmail and restart it to see inbox or have any other commands... until switching to another app, and gone again on return.

title: mail mix
text: it’s always mixing my mail, I have 2 different gmail accounts and somehow emails that go to one account ends up in the mail of the other account and the only way i’ve found a solution is by deleting the app and redownloading

title: Having problems
text:
I’m having a new issue when opening the app it opens with an email already open and the back button will not work anymore. I have to go out of the app and shut down the app and reopen so I can open a new email.

Thank you for the app update. My gmail works great again.

title: What happened to my emails
text: Love using gmail, but I often run into not being able to access my older emails that I NEVER deleted! Also, I think that being able to create groups for your emails should be a little easier instead of having to copy and paste the names repeatedly would be helpful.

title: Old interface

title: a recent version was broken and support here is not useful
text:
I had the following problem for about a week which is now fixed via the most recent update:

if i select a msg and it opens in right pane on ipad, and then i leave app and come back the msg is expanded and i cannot exit the message or navigate at all, have to force close app just to use it again. New bug as of a version here in mid/late february….but is killer, needs fixing ASAP

I received a developer response here on the apple store for my review which had absolutely nothing to do with my issue.  A link that had me check if I was connected to internet….are you kidding me?  Did you read my symptoms?    Multiple other people had posted reviews citing the same bug at the time.  Instead of testing for a bug or acknowledging it support was happy to waste my time with total nonsense that was clearly unrelated.   So I have increased stars to reflect the quality of the (now fixed) app but left a couple off to reflect quality of support.
